s: ^Hi Elisa!

Q32: ^Elisa?Neutral "I've been ok! We got a lot of new members for the nature club from that scavenger hunt, and some friends and I are going to go rock climbing next weekend."
^Elisa?Neutral "I don't know, I still feel kinda down, though."
